Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: DBS Black Visa Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: For every $5 spend, earn 3 DBS Points (or 6 miles) for all local contactless Visa payWave transactions and 1 DBS Point (2 miles) for all other transactions
Enjoy round-the-clock access to Visa Platinum Concierge and superior selection of year-round offers from prestigious hotels, golf clubs and retail stores

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: Up to S$120 Cashback:
1. S$70 Cashback when you charge a min. of S$700 per month for the first 2 months AND
2. S$50 Cashback when you apply for DBS Cashline at the same time

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: Apply for the card before 31 March 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: 3 DBS Points (or 6 miles) are only applicable for Visa payWave transactions made in Singapore.
Earn 1 DBS point (or 2 miles) for every S$5 charged to the card.

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: Earn 3X Rewards (3 DBS Points or 6 miles for every S$5 spend) for all local contactless Visa payWave transactions
1X DBS Point for all other transactions
1-for-1 deals and exclusive dining offers at Singapore's trendiest nightspots and restaurants

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: 14% savings at Esso (5% site + 5% loyalty + 4% DBS Cards)

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: Earn 3X Rewards (3 DBS Points or 6 miles for every S$5 spend) for all local contactless Visa payWave transactions
1X DBS Point for all other transactions

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Earn 3X Rewards (3 DBS Points or 6 miles for every S$5 spend) for all local contactless Visa payWave transactions
1X DBS Point for all other transactions
